title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-user support, model manager & RAG.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like coding assistant.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that adds Ollama-powered code completion and chat inside Neovim/Vim 9.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with dependency-injection helpers and Blazor chat demo.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app to manage Ollama models and chat sessions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama chat & code generation into your workspace threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for brainstorming and block summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as Generator & Embedder nodes.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for content generation.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to query Ollama models in no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rustlang
summary: Community effort to expose Ollama inside Rust source files via procedural macros for compile-time LLM calls.
